sentences.sContent: The hohokam culture disintegrated as they had difficulty maintaining the canals in the dry conditions of the drought.
sentences.sContent_eng: The hohokam culture disintegrated as they had difficulty maintaining the canals in the dry conditions of the drought.
sentences.sCn: 当干旱的条件使得运河很难被维护好的时候，霍霍坎文化瓦解了。
